description.html: A guy with a lovely family & varied interests. Chairman of Camp Quest Arizona, Chief Information Officer, developer, podcaster, science fiction fan, bicyclist, New Zealand Black Caps supporter. I live in Arizona and am the Lone Locust of the Apocalypse.

data.html: I got obsessed with using Pythonista on iOS to learn Python. I've published three scripts: * Check Starbucks Card https://gist.github.com/4053863 * Check Clipper Card https://gist.github.com/4053906 * Down For Everyone? https://gist.github.com/4053789
data.text:
I got obsessed with using Pythonista on iOS to learn Python.

I've published three scripts:
* Check Starbucks Card https://gist.github.com/4053863
* Check Clipper Card https://gist.github.com/4053906
* Down For Everyone? https://gist.github.com/4053789
